name: Mady Lime Chevron {Water Resistant}
description:
Perfect for the park, zoo, or just hanging around your neck!  It also makes a great gift for any photographer!

Outside: 100% Designer Chevron Cotton 
Inside: 100% Cream Cotton 
Padded and Water Resistant.

-Made in the USA.

-The sturdy buckle {pictured} attaches to you camera strap so you don't lose your Camera Coat while shooting!

-The 3 awesome pockets in the back are perfect for your smartphone or extra SD card.

-Strong Velcro keeps your camera nice and cozy inside its Camera Coat!

Handmade in the USA. Ditch that camera bag!

name: Mustard Yellow Damask {*WaterProof} Rain Slicky
description:
No need to carry around a big, bulky camera bag everywhere you go! This pretty Mustard Yellow Damask is waterproof, padded, & ready to protect you camera whether its around your neck or in your purse!

Inside: 100% Cotton 
Padded & Waterproof

-Sturdy Velcro closure.

Proudly Made in the USA! 
It may cost a little more, but we think its worth it!

name: Alpine Nylon {Ultra Padded & WaterResistant} Navy Vest
description:

-The 3 awesome pockets on the back are perfect for your smartphone or extra SD card.

-Strong velcro keeps your camera nice and cozy inside its Camera Coat!

Packaged and shipped by a local group of adults with disabilities at TURN Community Services!  We love supporting local workers!

name: Glimmer of Paris Black {*WaterProof}Camera Strap
description:
This camera strap is not only cute, but functional!  The thin strap (1.5" wide) will rest comfortably on the back of your neck & the *clips on each end make attaching it to your camera a snap!

You can wear this strap around your neck or extend it to be a cross shoulder strap.  Either way you're camera will love it. 

-One size fits all.
-Clip on attachment.
-Made in the USA!

+Packaged and shipped by local adults with disabilities...and they do a great job too!

*Clips are optional and easily removed. Please make sure that the clips are attached to your camera before each use to ensure your camera's safety!

name: Red Damask {*WaterProof} Camera Strap
description:

You can wear this strap around your neck or extend it to be a cross shoulder strap.  Either way you're camera will love it.

name: Shabby Hipster Blue {*WaterProof}
description:
Being hip has never been so smart!  This limited edition chevron is ideal for traveling, hanging out at the park, or even when your camera is sitting on the counter!  Padded, perfect protection for that DSLR.

Outside: 100% Designer Cotton Laminate 
Inside: 100% Off White Cotton
*Shabby Flowers are not WaterProof

-Sturdy Velcro closure. 
-Easily attaches to your camera strap with a sturdy buckle so you won't lose it! 
-Handy pockets on the outside are perfect for your lens cap, SD card, or smart phone!

MADE IN THE USA! (Just like all of our products!)

name: Shabby Glimmer of Paris/Black {*WaterProof} Rain Slicky | Limited Edition
description:
Available ONLY at ADORAMA.COM

==============================================

This sparkling WaterProof Camera Coat is not only stunning, but now has beautiful gray shabby flowers! With the splash of glitter on the beautiful black damask it will be a constant remind of the glimmering lights of Paris.  Traveling without your camera bag never looked so good!

Handmade in the USA.

Outside: 100% Designer Cotton Laminate
Inside: 100% White Cotton
*Shabby flowers are not WaterProof

Black buckle and strap. Lushly padded, like all of our coats!

-Wipes clean. 
-Sturdy Velcro closure. 
-Attaches easily to your camera strap with a sturdy buckle. 
-Handy pockets on the outside for your lens cap or smart phone!

Packaged and shipped by our friends with disabilities at TURN Community Services in Orem, UT!

More sizes coming soon!
